name: One of Us (rdkrause)
description:
A short 5-minute game created for the Global Game Jam 2016, theme was Ritual.

You've been captured by aliens and they think you're cute. Become one of them by participating in their sacred dance! Use the arrow keys at the right time to dance to the beat. Do a good job and you'll be welcomed into their ranks. Don't do a good job... and you'll see what happens.


Created by me. (Ryan Krause)

Alien sprites are from IgnasD, Background is by p0ss.

Music from audionautix.com by Jason Shaw.
